SERVICES THAT WE OFFER

HOME DELIVERY

customers under whole sale are eligible to free transport by the company vans whenever available. this also aplies to retail buysers at some point the the order purchased demand so. we also do door to door delivery at a subsidized rate.

WHOLE-SALE GOODS

We offer a 5% discout to the first three customers who buy goods on whole sale online.however this does not mean that other customers are overchaged.this is an inniciative that encourages customers to order even from their residentials.

RETAIL GOODS

however for retail goods we offer free transportation of goods worth 100000 ksh and above with a 4% discout on taxt rate. the first customer in a day in retails also gets to go home with shopping voucher pionts.
